Detailed Description

Abstract class that provides generic methods for Database Tables

Definition at line 37 of file BDDTable.php.

Member Function Documentation

BDDTable::__construct (  $  table,
BDDConnection $  connection,
&$  errors
) 
 

Initialises BDDTable for the table named $table on the given $connection.

Parameters:
$table name of the table
$connection BDDConnection for all table operations. This must be a valid and connected BDDConnection unless it will cause an Error.
$errors reference to an Errors object. It will be set if an error occurs during instanciation. If operation was successful, it equals NULL
